entry.title: Of Things Red and Undead
entry.summary:
Author: Bat_brat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 147,751Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 867

Summary: After his time as the Arkham Knight and the events that followed, Jason Todd is on a journey for redemption. He was trying, anyway, until you came along. You’re no stranger to the shadows that lurk in Gotham’s undertow, but one fateful night, everything is turned upside down and suddenly nothing, nowhere, and no one is safe. Gotham is used to this though right? How much trouble could you possibly be? Especially when a vigilante with anger issues, trauma, and a plethora of guns makes it his personal mission to find out exactly what you are.

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 679,625Chapters: 93/?Kudos: 470

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I’ve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,459Chapters: 21/30Kudos: 584

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n

entry.title: Oh, don't speak (just kiss me 'til I'm bleedin')
entry.summary:
Author: Kairynner

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,110Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 39

Summary: Vigilante!Reader, code-name Angel, takes care of the working girls that raised her and she grew up around. Killing for them has never been against her rules.Red Hood met you once and decided he needed you, though he sat on those feelings for years while you quietly infiltrated his everything until he couldn't focus while you patrolled the Narrows and he kept Crime Alley safe. He ends up stabbed, using it as a perfect excuse to visit the safehouse he knows you use often.He doesn't know why tonight is the night he wants to shatter on top of you in a delicate, snarling mess of desperation. All he knows is that he doesn't want it to be, but it is.And there you are, tearing him apart until he cries against you with gentle hands. Putting him back together with calm power. Tearing him apart again with a willingness to tear your wings off and fall together with a monster like him in the shower.Tearing him apart and piecing him together at the same time when you listen to the words he can never speak, telling him you love him and cradling him like he's precious.(Title: Ruin Me by Sebastian Schub)

entry.title: My Boy Only Breaks His Favorite Toys
entry.summary:
Author: ace_asterisk

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,874Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 53

Summary: In a city where kindness is fleeting and warmth feels like a myth, a reclusive vigilante crosses paths with another ghost orbiting the same darkness. What begins as cautious companionship spirals into something tender, fragile, and terrifying. But when fear drives him away, and violence drags you to the edge of death, Jason Todd is forced to confront the one truth he’s always run from: some things, once lost, can’t be stitched back together. And some things are worth bleeding for.
